Want to learn how to build apps?
He who moves his legs, moves his heart. Move it, heart!
No data found. Make sure GPS is active to track your run
To track your distance and speed, GPS access is required
Do you want to clear your running preferences?
We will reset your music and workout settings (mode and intervals) from your last session. Do not worry, nothing major.
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
This will permanently delete the record
Choose between running, biking, or skating and start your journey toward a more active life. You decide when, how, and where to train.
Track your progress with maps, speed, stopwatch, and personalized goals. Beat your records and reach new levels in each sport.
Turn your workout into an achievement
Earn medals, level up, and save your best moments with photos during your route. RaidoRun turns every run into an experience!
